# ShortcutsLinkStyle

**Structure**

The styles to apply to buttons you use to open your app’s page in the Shortcuts app.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ShortcutsLinkStyle
```

## Overview

Specify a [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/ShortcutsLinkStyle] value when you add a [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/ShortcutsUIButton] or [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/ShortcutsLink] type to your interface. For the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/ShortcutsLink] type, specify the style using the `AppIntents/ShortcutsLink/shortcutsLinkStyle(_:)` modifier.

## Getting the styles

- **automatic**: The default button style, based on the current color scheme.
- **automaticOutline**: The default button style with an outline, based on the current color scheme.
- **dark**: A button style that applies a dark background with light text.
- **darkOutline**: A button style that applies a dark background with light text along with a light outline.
- **light**: A button style that applies a light background with dark text.
- **lightOutline**: A button style that applies a light background with dark text along with a dark outline.

## Buttons

- **ShortcutsUIButton**: A button that opens the current app’s page in the Shortcuts app.
- **ShortcutsLink**: A button that brings users to the current app’s App Shortcuts page in the Shortcuts app.
